body:
I' m trying to fix boost building with intel compiler, as reported in #535 like:

spack -d --verbose  install --jobs 20   boost@1.58.0+mpi%intel@15.0.2^openmpi@1.8.8

This fix errors related to the toolchain name and to the fact that toolchain was specified in both  bootstrap.sh and at b2.sh command line.

The problem with variants not checked with compatibility for older version and the related one regarding  log file names too long  still remain as I have no idea  how to possibly address
title: fix boost intel build
